== About Me ==
Hi, my name is Portia Stephens (https://launchpad.net/~portias). I am a member of the <nowiki>[[KernelTeam|{{https:--launchpadlibrarian.net-7080714-ubuntu-kernel-team-small.png}}]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[KernelTeam|Ubuntu Kernel Team]]</nowiki> at Canonical.

== What I do ==
I joined the Linux Kernel Team at Canonical in 2022. I work on the Partner Engineering engagement with Xilinx. I also contribute to stable upstream updates.
